tags:
Authentication

APIs for managing user authentication
post.description: Authenticate a user with their email and password, and return an access token.

requestBody.description: Authenticate a user with their email and password, and return an access token.

email.description: The email address of the user.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/auth/login" 
    -d "email"="user@example.com" \
    -d "password"="password123"

tags:
Authentication

APIs for managing user authentication
get.description: Retrieve details of the currently authenticated user.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/auth/me"

tags:
Authentication

APIs for managing user authentication
post.description: Revoke the current user's access token and log them out.

requestBody.description: Revoke the current user's access token and log them out.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/auth/logout"

tags:
Authentication

APIs for managing user authentication
post.description: Revoke the current token and issue a new one.

requestBody.description: Revoke the current token and issue a new one.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/auth/refresh"
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/user/add"
curl -X PATCH "http://localhost/api/user/{id}/edit"
curl -X DELETE "http://localhost/api/user/{id}/delete"
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/role/add"
curl -X PATCH "http://localhost/api/role/{id}/edit"
curl -X DELETE "http://localhost/api/role/{id}/delete"
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/tag/add"
curl -X PATCH "http://localhost/api/tag/{id}/edit"
curl -X DELETE "http://localhost/api/tag/{id}/delete"

1.author: Kesehatan
1.title: Kesehatan
1.content: Kesehatan adalah hal yang sangat penting bagi kehidupan manusia, oleh karena itu kita harus menjaga kesehatan kita dengan cara mengkonsumsi makanan yang sehat dan bergizi, serta olahraga yang teratur.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/forum/add"
curl -X PATCH "http://localhost/api/forum/{id}/edit"
